description: This Dart source file defines the WalletEntry model for a personal finance application, including enum for entry types, a class for database column constants, and a WalletEntry data class with serialization, copying, and utility methods.

classes.name: WalletType
classes.description: Enum representing the type of wallet entry, either income or expense, with utility methods for database conversion.

classes.name: WalletEntryFields
classes.description: Class containing constants for the database table name and column names related to wallet entries.

classes.name: WalletEntry
classes.description: Data class modeling a wallet transaction record, with methods for construction from database data, serialization, copying, and string representation.

methods.name: WalletType.toDbValue
methods.description: Converts WalletType enum to an integer value for database storage.

methods.name: WalletType.fromDbValue
methods.description: Creates a WalletType enum from an integer value retrieved from the database.

methods.name: WalletEntry.fromDbMap
methods.description: Factory constructor to create a WalletEntry instance from a database map.

methods.name: WalletEntry.toDbMap
methods.description: Converts a WalletEntry instance into a map suitable for database insertion or update.

methods.name: WalletEntry.copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of the WalletEntry with optional new field values.
